metadata.title: Juglans | The World's First Vibe Trading App
metadata.description: Juglans is the world's first Vibe Trading app, enabling you to make investment decisions through natural language. Say goodbye to complex charts, just ask.

hero.badge: The World's First Vibe Trading App
hero.subtitle: Juglans empowers your investment decisions with natural language. Say goodbye to complex charts and talk to your personal AI trader.
terminalCommands: Compare NVDA and AMD's P/E ratios...
What's the market sentiment on crypto today?
Show me ESG funds with high returns...

features.title: Juglans AI: Your Intuitive Crypto Co-Pilot
features.subtitle: Unleash the power of professional trading without the complexity. Juglans AI transforms your trading experience by turning natural conversation into intelligent action.

conversational.title: Conversational Trading & Analysis
conversational.description: Forget complicated menus. Just tell the AI what you want in plain English, like "Are there any bullish patterns on ETH?"

visualized.title: Visualized AI Strategies
visualized.description: AI isn't a black box. Every suggestion and analysis is drawn directly on your chart. See exactly what the AI is thinking.

scanner.title: Proactive Market Scanner
scanner.description: Our AI acts as your personal analyst, constantly scanning for opportunities based on your criteria, like assets with surging volume.

automated.title: Automated Technical Analysis
automated.description: Let the AI handle the heavy lifting. It automatically identifies patterns, draws support/resistance levels, and interprets indicators.

planFirst.title: Plan First, Trade Second
planFirst.description: Every idea becomes a visual plan with entry, stop-loss, and take-profit targets. You are the pilot; the AI is your co-pilot.

mentor.title: Built-In Trading Mentor
mentor.description: New to trading? Ask the AI to explain any trading term, pattern, or indicator. Learn by doing with an expert guide.

howItWorks.title: How It Works: Sense, Think, Act
howItWorks.subtitle: Juglans AI combines a state-of-the-art charting engine with a powerful Large Language Model (LLM) to create a seamless, context-aware trading assistant.

sense.title: 1. Sense: Comprehensive Context Awareness
sense.description: The AI gathers a complete picture of the market and your personal context, understanding the chart, timeframe, and even your portfolio status.

think.title: 2. Think: Intelligent Analysis & Strategy
think.description: Using a leading LLM, the AI processes your request, selects the right tool, and formulates a complete trading plan with calculated risk.

act.title: 3. Act: Visual Execution & Confirmation
act.description: The AI's output is rendered visually on your chart. You can interact with the plan and have the final say before any trade is executed.

hero.title: What is Vibe Trading?
hero.subtitle: It's trading based on your intuition, powered by AI. No complex charts, no confusing jargon. Just your ideas, turned into intelligent action.

problem.title: The Old Way: Overwhelming & Anxious
points: Endless charts and indicators to learn.
Fear of missing out (FOMO) drives impulsive decisions.
Information overload leads to analysis paralysis.
Requires significant time and technical expertise.

solution.title: The Juglans Way: Intuitive & Confident
points: Speak your thoughts in plain English.
AI translates your 'vibe' into a clear, visual plan.
You remain in control, making the final, informed decision.

cta.title: Ready to Trade with Your Vibe?

content.heading: 1. Introduction
content.text: Welcome to Juglans.ai. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website or use our services.

content.heading: 2. Information We Collect
content.text: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together as follows: Identity Data, Contact Data, Technical Data, and Usage Data.

content.heading: 3. How We Use Your Information
content.text: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data to perform the contract we are about to enter into or have entered into with you, and where it is necessary for our legitimate interests.

content.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
content.text: By accessing or using the Juglans.ai service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the service.

content.heading: 2. No Investment Advice
content.text: The information and tools provided by Juglans.ai are for informational purposes only and do not constitute financial or investment advice. You are solely responsible for your own investment decisions and any losses that may result.

content.heading: 3. Intellectual Property
